price: ߡߍ߲ ߓߊ߯ ߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߬ߤߘߌ ߝߊ߫ ߗߐ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬߸ ߒ߬ߓߵߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߝߍ߬
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
